text: Era mukkalire mu mayumba gammwe era temwejaajaamyanga enneejaajaamya ey'obutamanya obwaliwo mu kusooka era muyimirizeewo e sswala ne Zakka mugitoole, era mugondere Katonda nâ€™omubakawe mazima Katonda ayagala okubaggyako ebibi abange mmwe abantu bo mu nyumba (ya Nabbi) era abatukuze olutukuza olwa nnamaddala
